get.summary: Get list of Facultys in system (Require ADMIN right to perform)
get.description:
Available fields for searchBy:
- name

Available fields for orderBy:
- name
- number of users

post.summary: Create a new Faculty (Require ADMIN right to perform)

get.summary: Get Faculty by Id (Require ADMIN right to perform)

put.summary: Update an existing Faculty by Id (Require ADMIN right to perform)

delete.summary: Delete the existing Faculty by Id (Require ADMIN right to perform)

post.summary: Assign Faculty to User (Require ADMIN right to perform)
post.description: Entering FacultyId and userId you want to assign Faculty for

delete.summary: Remove User from Faculty (Require ADMIN right to perform
delete.description: Entering userId and FacultyId you want to remove from user

get.summary: Get list of users (Require ADMIN right to perform)
get.description:
Fields available for search: 
- username 
- firstname 
- lastname

Fields available for order:
- username
- birthdate
